attributes.action: Make it ILLEGAL to underfund & sell off the NHS
attributes.additional_details:
In light of the Covid_19 epidemic NHS funding MUST be made a priority above all else
Make it illegal to underfund or privatise ANY PART of the NHS 
The healthcare of UK Citizens MUST come first
attributes.background:
Funding for the NHS to be a priority above all else
Make it illegal to underfund NHS care of all kinds &
Make it illegal to sell off the NHS to private companies

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300019
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300925
